summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3453, for the improvement of Miller Street, from 19th Avenue North to 24th Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42797 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
